markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Urdefhan](/Traits.aspx?ID=315)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 310 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Urdefhans are humanoids who have pacts with daemons, have transparent skin, and drink blood.
